sentences.en: " Oh, go'long with you, Tom, before you aggravate me again.
sentences.cn: “ 哦, 去你的, 汤姆.别再气我了.

sentences.en: Building the new road will only aggravate the situation .
sentences.cn: 建造那条新路只会使情况恶化。

sentences.en: For such fuels, sulphur is claimed to aggravate problems of wear and deposits.
sentences.cn: 对于这些燃料油来说, 硫被认为会增大磨损和沉淀问题.

sentences.en: He would only aggravate the injury by rubbing it.
sentences.cn: 他揉擦伤口只会使伤势加重。
他的拔扈态度激怒了我.

sentences.en: I just laughed and agreed because I don't want to aggravate her just now.
sentences.cn: 我只是笑笑答应了,因为暂时我不想把她惹恼了.

sentences.en: If the reports are well founded, the incident could seriously aggravate relations between the two nations.
sentences.cn: 如果这些报道是有根据的，那么该事件将有可能导致两国之间的关系严重恶化。

sentences.en: In other districts the proximity of cemeteries seemed to aggravate the disease.
sentences.cn: 在其它地区里,邻近墓地的地方,时疫大概都要严重些.

sentences.en: Pollutants may also aggravate natural changes in the marine environment.
sentences.cn: 污染物也会加剧海洋环境的变化.

sentences.en: Stress and lack of sleep can aggravate the situation.
sentences.cn: 压力和睡眠不足会使情况恶化。

sentences.en: Tell your friend it's especially important to avoid injuries that could aggravate his condition.
sentences.cn: 告诉你的朋友别开口辱人有多重要那只会恶化他的情况.

sentences.en: The existing bromine in acetic acid could aggravate corrosion on metal hole.
sentences.cn: 醋酸中含溴会加剧金属孔蚀.

sentences.en: The plan is likely only to aggravate ethnic frictions.
sentences.cn: 这一方案很有可能只会加剧种族冲突。

sentences.en: Their money problems were further aggravated by a rise in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 由于利率上调，他们的财务问题更加严重。
